components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: Laptops may contain heavy metals such as lead, cadmium, and mercury. These metals can be toxic and pose environmental risks if they leach into the soil or water.

components.name: Batteries
components.data: Most laptops are equipped with lithium-ion batteries, which can pose fire hazards if damaged or improperly disposed of.

components.name: Plastics
components.data: The plastic casings of laptops can contain harmful chemicals, including brominated flame retardants, which can be hazardous to human health and the environment.

components.name: Circuit Boards
components.data: Laptops contain printed circuit boards (PCBs) that may have heavy metals and other hazardous materials.

recovered_items.name: Plastic
recovered_items.data: can be recycled into new products

components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: PCs may contain heavy metals like lead, mercury, and cadmium, which can pose health risks if not disposed of properly.

components.name: Brominated Flame Retardants
components.data: BFRs are often used in the plastic casings and circuit boards of PCs to reduce fire risk, but these chemicals can be harmful to the environment.

components.name: Power Supply Units
components.data: The power supply units may contain hazardous materials and should be handled carefully during disposal.

components.name: Batteries
components.data: Smartphones typically use lithium-ion batteries, which can pose fire and environmental hazards if not handled correctly.

components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: Smartphones can contain heavy metals such as lead, cadmium, and mercury in their components, which can be harmful to human health and the environment.

components.name: Rare Earth Elements
components.data: Smartphones often contain rare earth elements, which are essential for their functionality but can have significant environmental impacts if not recycled properly.

recovered_items.name: Metals
recovered_items.data: gold, silver, and copper from circuit boards

components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: Printers may contain heavy metals such as lead, cadmium, and mercury, posing health risks if not disposed of properly.

components.name: Ink Cartridges
components.data: Ink cartridges can contain hazardous materials and should be recycled correctly.

components.name: Brominated Flame Retardants
components.data: These are often used in the plastic components of printers.

components.name: Neodymium Magnets
components.data: HDDs contain powerful neodymium magnets, which can be dangerous if mishandled.

components.name: Electronics Components
components.data: HDDs contain various electronic components like circuit boards, chips, and capacitors that may have hazardous materials.

components.name: Brominated Flame Retardants
components.data: BFRs are often used in the plastics and circuit boards of HDDs.

recovered_items.name: Circuit Boards (PCBs)
recovered_items.data: electronic components like controller and memory chips

components.name: Silicon Chips
components.data: RAM chips contain silicon, which is abundant but requires energy-intensive extraction and processing.

components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: Some RAM chips may contain heavy metals like lead and cadmium.

components.name: Brominated Flame Retardants
components.data: BFRs can also be found in the casings and components of RAM.

recovered_items.name: Silicon
recovered_items.data: can be recycled for new chips

recovered_items.name: Metals
recovered_items.data: copper and aluminum from the circuit boards

components.name: Refrigerants
components.data: Air conditioners use refrigerants that can deplete the ozone layer if released.

components.name: Compressor Oil
components.data: Contains hazardous chemicals and should be carefully managed.

components.name: Electrical Components
components.data: Various electronic components may contain hazardous materials.

components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: Televisions may contain heavy metals such as lead and mercury, which can be harmful to health and the environment.

components.name: Brominated Flame Retardants
components.data: BFRs are often used in the casings and circuit boards of TVs.

components.name: LCD Panels
components.data: LCD screens contain hazardous materials, including mercury.

recovered_items.name: Metals
recovered_items.data: aluminum, copper, and precious metals from circuit boards

components.name: Refrigerants
components.data: Refrigerators contain refrigerants that can be harmful to the environment if released.

components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: Fridges may contain heavy metals like lead and mercury.

components.name: Insulation Foam
components.data: Some refrigerators contain insulation foam that can release harmful chemicals.

components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: Washing machines may contain heavy metals such as lead and cadmium.

components.name: Electrical Components
components.data: Washing machines contain various electronic components that may have hazardous materials.

components.name: Brominated Flame Retardants
components.data: These are often used in the plastic components.

components.name: Mercury
components.data: Fluorescent lamps contain small amounts of mercury, which is hazardous.

components.name: Phosphor Coating
components.data: The phosphor coating inside lamps can be hazardous if broken.

components.name: Glass
components.data: The glass can be broken and should be handled carefully.

components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: Routers may contain heavy metals like lead and cadmium.

components.name: Plastic Components
components.data: The plastic casing and internal components can contain harmful chemicals.

components.name: Brominated Flame Retardants
components.data: BFRs are often used in routers.

components.name: Lead-Acid Batteries
components.data: Lead-acid batteries contain lead and sulfuric acid, which can be harmful to health and the environment.

components.name: Lithium-Ion Batteries
components.data: These batteries can pose fire hazards if damaged and contain hazardous materials.

components.name: Nickel-Cadmium Batteries
components.data: Nickel-cadmium batteries contain cadmium, a toxic heavy metal.

components.name: Copper Wires
components.data: Copper wires are commonly used in electrical applications and can be recycled.

components.name: Insulation Materials
components.data: The plastic insulation can contain harmful chemicals.

components.name: Heavy Metals
components.data: Circuit boards may contain heavy metals such as lead, gold, and silver.

components.name: Brominated Flame Retardants
components.data: BFRs are commonly used in the manufacturing of circuit boards.
